alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued April 11 at 3:55PM CDT until further notice by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in Minnesota... Mississippi River at Fort Ripley affecting Crow Wing zone. .Warm temperatures causing rapid snowmelt will cause increases to river flows. ...FLOOD WATCH FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Fort Ripley. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.5 feet, Flooding of low lying areas adjacent the river is expected * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:30 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 10.5 feet. - Flood safety information can be found at www.weather.gov/safety/flood. &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/duluth. The next statement will be issued Thursday afternoon by 400 PM CDT.
